clues.text: Later the host of "The Tonight Show", this man began his TV career at Omaha's WOW-TV

This language that "Beowulf" was written in is more like modern German than the language we speak
A 1623 Walloon drama was literally one of these preachy "plays" -- that was the title

An auxilliary building near the main one, or to attach a territory to an existing state or nation
